document_name_accent: nhiem trung ban chan tieu duong.json
document_title: Diabetic foot infections: Causes and symptoms
subsection_content: Diabetic foot infection is a diabetic foot injury caused by infection, ulceration, and/or deep tissue destruction associated with neurological abnormalities, some stages of the disease. Peripheral vascular and/or metabolic complications of the disease occur in the legs. This is a common and serious injury. (first)
subsection_title: nhiem trung ban chan tieu duong.json. What is diabetic foot infection?
subsection_data:
nhiem trung ban chan tieu duong.json. What is diabetic foot infection?
Diabetic foot infection is a diabetic foot injury caused by infection, ulceration, and/or deep tissue destruction associated with neurological abnormalities, some stages of the disease. Peripheral vascular and/or metabolic complications of the disease occur in the legs. This is a common and serious injury. (first)
